value.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, *
value.halfverse: by divine mercy we have a new birth into a living hope;
we have an inheritance that is imperishable in heaven.
value.verse: Through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead, *

value.halfverse: was not paid in silver or gold,
value.verse: The ransom that was paid to free us *
But in the precious blood of Christ, *
value.halfverse: the Lamb without spot or stain.

value.verse: God raised Jesus from the dead and gave him glory *
value.halfverse: so that we might have faith and hope in God.
